annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m taking a look at how to make the perfect Dark and Stormy cocktail. Fun fact, Gosling’s enforces a claim they hold over t...
annotations.title: Dark and Stormy | How to Drink

textContent:
.5oz Lime juice
1.5oz Ginger syrup
2oz Rum

Quick shake and pour
Top with seltzer
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1RZ0fhrtNY
title: Dark and Stormy
